qas.question: Saint Helena is a member of what kind of association?
Where did the Saint Helena cricket team make it's debut in international cricket?

answers.text: Division Three of the African region of the World Cricket League

qas.question: When did the Saint Helena cricket team make it's debut in international cricket?

context: Sports played on the island include football, cricket, volleyball, tennis, golf, motocross, shooting sports and yachting. Saint Helena has sent teams to a number of Commonwealth Games. Saint Helena is a member of the <a0_0>International Island Games Association<a0_0/>. The Saint Helena cricket team made its debut in international cricket in <a1_0>Division Three of the African region of the World Cricket League<a1_0/> in <a2_0>2011<a2_0/>.
